text: Minamoto no Mitsuyuki (源 光行 1163–1244) was governor in Kawachi province. Mitsuyuki's cousin was the famous samurai Yorimasa. Category:People of Heian- period Japan Category:People of Kamakura-period Japan Category:1163 births Category:1244 deaths Category:Governors of Japanese prefectures
title: Minamoto no Mitsuyuki
